response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This unique item carries a value of $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and the time, effort, and resources invested into it. I am confident that it holds even greater potential for you, given your expertise and vision.

To make this offer more attractive, I am willing to extend a special deal where you can purchase the product for $1,080,000. This represents a substantial saving of $120,000 compared to its intrinsic value, providing you with a remarkable return on investment.

Please consider this proposal carefully. I am looking forward to discussing the details further and exploring how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1080000}
